Nonprofit Accelerates Research and Funding (Empatheatre)
Non-profit

A performing arts nonprofit was spending countless hours on proposal writing and background research.

I created companion AI tools—one to assist with drafting funding proposals while preserving their unique voice, and another to rapidly compile relevant background research on potential project topics.

This has allowed them to pursue more opportunities while maintaining the quality and authenticity that funders expect.
